data.title: CHP member Tanrıkulu draws attention to the appointment of a governor: Is preparation being made for a trustee in Diyarbakır?
data.meta_description: Murat Zorluoğlu, who was appointed as a trustee to Van Municipality in 2017 while serving as the Governor of Van and later served as the Mayor of Trabzon Metropolitan Municipality, has been appointed as the Governor of Diyarbakır with the signature of President Erdoğan. Following this development, CHP member Sezgin Tanrıkulu made a statement saying, 'I hope Zorluoğlu's appointment as the Governor of Diyarbakır is not a preparation for a possible appointment of a trustee.'
data.text:
Mourinho is desperately searching for him! There is news about Fred, who is injured at Fenerbahçe.

Fred, who got injured in Fenerbahçe's UEFA Champions League second qualifying round second leg match against Lugano and was diagnosed with damage to his right knee medial ligament, has started individual training. The team's coach, Jose Mourinho, expressed his longing for the Brazilian star in his statements after his injury, emphasizing that his absence has affected the team's game.

5 minutes ago...

Former President of the Council of State, Nuri Alan, passed away.

Former President of the Council of State, Nuri Alan, passed away at the age of 85 due to age-related health issues. After the funeral prayer held at Kocatepe Mosque in Ankara, Alan was laid to rest at Karşıyaka Cemetery.

25 minutes ago...

The indictment is ready for the "Money Counting" footage in CHP! The prosecution requested the transfer of money and the building to the treasury.

An indictment has been prepared in the investigation into the alleged money counting footage taken at the CHP Istanbul Provincial Presidency. The imprisonment of 22 suspects, including former Istanbul Provincial Chairman of CHP, Canan Kaftancıoğlu, is being requested. The prosecution has also requested the registration of the immovable property in question in the name of the treasury, on the grounds that it was purchased with illegally collected money, and the transfer of the money to the treasury.

-6 minutes ago...

A young woman, who is a mother of three children, was found shot in her bed.

A woman, who is a mother of three children, was found shot in the chest at her residence in Malatya. The young woman, who was taken to the hospital, lost her life, while her husband was taken into custody.

-6 minutes ago...

Bombshell Claim: Galatasaray Coach Okan Buruk and famous singer Hadise are in a romantic relationship.

Galatasaray coach Okan Buruk, who is known for his winning trophies, is now in the spotlight for his love life. It is claimed that Buruk, who divorced his fashion designer wife Nihan Akkuş of 17 years last February, is in a relationship with famous singer Hadise. This rumor, which shook the entertainment world, has become a hot topic on social media.

-5 minutes ago...
